review: If you are (somehow) on the fence about buying this just do it. With a few quick downloads for apps and chrome extensions I was streaming my web browser and my local files within minutes. Extremely easy to setup and use. Packaging was very solid and minimalist in appearance, as is expected of Google. The only momentary issue I ran into was the HDMI port itself was slightly less than perfectly machined a required a bit of force the first time i plugged it in, not enough to knock a star. Absolutely happy with my purchase you will not find a better way of streaming your media.
